articles.author: Press Association
articles.content:
THE BRITISH GOVERNMENT has moved to unilaterally ease another element of the contentious Brexit arrangements governing trade to Northern Ireland.
A ban on importing plants potted in soil from Great … [+5755 chars]
articles.description: The European Commission is taking legal action against the UK government for its latest moves regarding the Northern Ireland protocol.
articles.title: British government unilaterally relaxes more trade rules between Britain and NI amid EU fury - TheJournal.ie

articles.description: European diplomat says his colleagues would prefer to have shots being given in their home country.
articles.title: China offers Covid-19 vaccine to foreign diplomats – but will they take it? - South China Morning Post
